issue.title: What packages are needed to use CommsClient?

content.raw:
I think you should only need ignition-transport and the packages under subt-communication subdirectory of the subt repos \([#!/osrf/subt/src/default/subt-communication/](#!/osrf/subt/src/default/subt-communication)\). 

_Really_ you only need one part of the subt-communication/subt\_communication\_broker package which only depends on ignition-transport but the client and server are currently packaged together.
content.html:
I think you should only need ignition-transport and the packages under subt-communication subdirectory of the subt repos (#!/osrf/subt/src/default/subt-communication/).

Really you only need one part of the subt-communication/subt_communication_broker package which only depends on ignition-transport but the client and server are currently packaged together.
